message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm initially thinking around $15,000.  What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $15,000 is my ideal price point, I could be willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value and this is a fair offer.
I understand that $13,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider that?
